quest.Name: Ancient Grudges
quest.Accomplishment: You decided to investigate the foundation of Shik and Spar.
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, diligent =name= set the first stone of the Cathedral of Shikspar.
quest.Gospel: At the Battle of Shikspar, =name= defeated united cats and dogs hordes. In awe, survivors bend the paw and swore fealty to the sultan. From then on, =player.subjective= always kept a lock of fur on =player.possessive= person.

step.Name: Confer with Warden Arendubark
step.text: Ask Warden Arendubark of Shik and Spar, in the northern outskirts, about the villages' current situation.

step.Name: Investigate the Founder
step.text: Find clues on Shik and Spar's mysterious founder.

step.Name: Return to Warden Arendubark
step.text: Report your findings to Warden Arendubark.

quest.Name: On Bubumube's Trail
quest.Accomplishment: You set out on a journey to discover the truth about Shik and Spar's founder.
quest.Hagiograph: Selfless =name=, remarking the absence of =player.possessive= counselor Bubumube, rescued them from wild beasts. The sultan protects =player.possessive= folk!
quest.Gospel: Happening upon the funerals of a great leader, =name= stepped forth and held =player.possessive= hand over their forehead. There King Bubumube rose again, and =name= was thenceforth known as the Indigo Mender of Kings.

step.Name: Confer with Mayor Haddas
step.text: Travel to Ezra and ask Mayor Haddas about Bubumube.

step.Name: Investigate the Founder
step.text: Discover all of Bubumube's history.

step.Name: Return to Shik and Spar
step.text: Return to Warden Arendubark and announce your discoveries.

quest.Name: The Gathering of Shikspar
quest.Accomplishment: You revealed the truth about Shik and Spar's founder to the villages' mayors.
quest.Hagiograph: Knowledge pierces the darkness! =name= unearthed ancient knowledge to broker peace between warring nations.
quest.Gospel: When administering justice, =name= was petitioned by siblings arguing over the property of a hut. In perfect fairness, =name= ordered the hut burnt down, and split the ashes evenly between siblings.

step.Name: Invite Mayor Raroofwor
step.text: Invite Shik's leader to take part in the Gathering of Shikspar.

step.Name: Invite Lady Morrarri
step.text: Invite Spar's leader to take part in the Gathering of Shikspar.

step.Name: Reveal the Truth
step.text: Take part in the Gathering of Shikspar and reveal the truth about Shik and Spar's founder.

quest.Name: Swear by the Beetle Moon
quest.Accomplishment: You reunited two lovers against all odds.
quest.Hagiograph: Love prospers! In the month of =month= of =year=, adventurous =name= eloped from Shikspar with Oof Growf and Rrromaw.
quest.Gospel: Standing in the ruins of a colossal wall, =name= cemented =player.possessive= friendship with the bears of Shikspar by marrying into the royal couple Oof Growf and Rrromaw.

step.Name: Deliver the Message
step.text: Carry Oof Growf's note to Rrromaw, in Spar.

step.Name: Help Prepare the Date
step.text: Return to Rrromaw with flowers, a dram of wine, and a smooth gemstone.

step.Name: Deliver the Invitation
step.text: Inform Oof Growf of the date's time and location.

step.text: Carry Rrromaw's note to Oof Growf, in Shik.

step.Name: Help Prepare the Date
step.text: Return to Oof Growf with flowers, a dram of wine, and a smooth gemstone.

step.Name: Deliver the Invitation
step.text: Inform Rrromaw of the date's time and location.

quest.Name: What's Eating the Porcine Cheese?
quest.Accomplishment: You solved the mystery of the missing cheese.
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, canny =name= pierced the secret of fermenting milk.
quest.Gospel: Deep in the desert canyons, =name= beheld a basin of cream under the Hind Sun until curds respectfully split from whey. There, =player.subjective= named the dish 'cheese', and distributed it to =player.possessive= followers.

step.Name: Find the Cheese Eaters
step.text: Find the creatures preying on Spar's cheese stock.

step.Name: Put a Definitive End to Cheese Eaters
step.text: Solve the matter of the vermin eating Spar's cheese.

step.Name: Report Back to Imimiw
step.text: Inform Imimiw Spar's cheese stock is safe.

quest.Name: Drenched in Asphalt
quest.Accomplishment: You retrieved the final ingredient for an outstanding meal.
quest.Hagiograph: Generous =name= feeds the hungry! Walking through the flames, =player.subjective= bestows manna to =player.possessive= attendants.
quest.Gospel: Let it be known that =name= counted amongst his foes a many-headed beast of hatred. =name= struck it down, and retrieved from its stomach the bituminous remains of a long-lost friend.

step.Name: Travel to the Asphalt Mines
step.text: Journey three parasangs north and six parasangs east of the Six Day Stilt, to the Asphalt Mines.

step.Name: Find the Secret Ingredient
step.text: Collect tar-encrusted bones.

step.Name: Return with the Ingredient
step.text: Bring tar-encrusted bones back to Growarows so they can finish their recipe.
